name: encoding file
FAQ
func:
msg.buffer = msg.req.files[0].buffer

msg.decodedFilename = '/data/storage/' + msg.req.files[0].originalname

msg.payload = {
    _id: objectid(),
    knowledgeBaseId:objectid(msg.oldPayload.id),
    name: msg.req.files[0].originalname,
    type: "FAQ",
    file: msg.req.files[0].originalname,
    vectors: [],
    status: "Source saved",
    deleted: false,
    createdAt: new Date(),
    totaCharacters: msg.totaCharacters
};
return msg;
